about.me: Up to 45% of all pool fees support 🎓 free education, 🏥 universal healthcare, ☔ unemployment support, 👵 👴 pension funds, 🌱 environmental protection and 🚋 public infrastructure. More info on https://cardano.ich-war-hier.de
about.server: Fedora Linux, 4 AMD Epic 7702 Cores, 16 GB DDR4 ECC RAM, 320 GB SSD, 2.5 GBit/s, ≥99.9 % SLA; This setup will be _easily_ scaled up if necessary. This pool consist of one blockproducer, one backup-blockproducer and three relays. All on different machines an spread accross two independent datacenters in two locations. The setup will be easily scaled up if necessary. Actual utilization is low: CPU 3.2 %, RAM 52 %, disk 16 % (2022-01-11). No reason for excessive energy consumption and costs just now!
